attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the MP's expenses crisis the only way for Parliament to regain the respect of the nation is for the Prime Minister to call a immediate general election and give the electorate the opportunity to vote out these MP's. The voters should not be forced to wait upto a year to pass judgement on the people that have been feathering their own nests at our expense, just to allow Gordon Brown to hang onto power for another twelve months, he is acting only in his own interests by not calling an election!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
